itemInfo.itemDesc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be Processed for use as a Cooking ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock.

- Usage: Beehive Cookie, etc.

item.name: Top-Quality Honey
item.desc:
A natural resource originally obtained through Gathering that has been Processed for use as a Cooking Ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be produced by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock and then Grinding the acquired Beehive.

- Usage: Oatmeal, Tea With Fine Scent, etc.

item.name: High-Quality Cooking Honey
item.desc:
A natural resource originally obtained through Gathering that has been Processed for use as a Cooking Ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be produced by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock and then Grinding the acquired Beehive.

- Usage: Oatmeal, Tea With Fine Scent, etc.

item.name: Cooking Honey
item.desc:
A natural resource originally obtained through Gathering that has been Processed for use as a Cooking Ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be produced by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock and then Grinding the acquired Beehive.

- Usage: Oatmeal, Tea With Fine Scent, etc.

item.name: Maple Decorated Beeswax Chandelier (Fluorescent)
item.desc: A fluorescent wax chandelier decorated with maple.

item.name: Copper Decorated Beeswax Chandelier (Fluorescent)
item.desc: A fluorescent wax chandelier decorated with copper.

item.name: Tin Decorated Beeswax Chandelier (Fluorescent)
item.desc: A fluorescent wax chandelier decorated with tin.
